Text.Page:
The Black Claw tribe is one of the most hostile orcan groups around here. They even attack Frontera from time to time. This can't go on.

I'd like you to hunt some {@LinkCreature:41#2004#Black Claw fighters} and {@LinkCreature:41#2005#raiders} for me. And bring their arms back to {@LinkCreature:241#1003$$Jaebel}. She'll hang them up around the camp as a warning.
Good work. This should make them think twice about raiding us.
You'll find the Black Claw tribe in the northern end of Feral Valley. Bring me some arms I can wave around as a warning.
